args.natural_language_statement: Show that SL(n) ⊲ GL(n) and that GL(n)/SL(n) ≃ R^×, for real numbers. Translate to Lean4. Define GL(n) as Units (Matrix n n ℝ) and SL(n) as the subgroup of GL(n) with determinant 1. State: 1) SL(n) is a normal subgroup of GL(n). 2) There is a group isomorphism GL(n)/SL(n) ≃ ℝˣ (units of ℝ). End each statement with := by sorry. Include Mathlib import at top. Use general finite index type n with [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n].

args.natural_language_statement:
Lemma statements: For (n : Type) [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n], define GL n := (Matrix n n ℝ)ˣ and SL n := {A : GL n | Matrix.det (A : Matrix n n ℝ) = 1}. Prove:
1) SL n is a normal subgroup of GL n.
2) There is a group isomorphism (GL n) / (SL n) ≃* (ℝˣ), given by sending A to Units.mk0 A.det _.
Translate to Lean4 code, end with := by sorry. Include `import Mathlib` at top and save file srdoty_alg_quotient-gps_337.lean.
